content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. Let's discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I am a student and I am looking for a place with the lowest possible rent. I would like to pay no more than 400 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that is much lower than my expectations. My apartment is in the city center and offers a lot of convenience. I believe a fair price would be closer to 800 euros per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I appreciate that the apartment is in a great location. However, I have found similar apartments in the city center for around 600 euros per month. I am willing to pay up to 650 euros per month for this apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 650 euros is still below my asking price, but considering your student status, I might be willing to negotiate. How long are you looking to rent the apartment for? Is it just for the duration of your studies?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I am planning to rent the apartment for 2 years. I am a dependable and responsible tenant. I always pay rent on time and take good care of the property. I am willing to pay 680 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, your offer is still not quite what I'm looking for. However, I can see that you are a serious tenant. How about this: I'll reduce the deposit fee for you if you agree to pay 720 euros per month. This is a fair deal considering the location and the brand-new condition of the apartment. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I appreciate the offer for a reduced deposit fee. However, I am still a student and I have to watch my expenses closely. I am willing to pay 700 euros per month, which is a reasonable price for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, you have been very reasonable in your negotiations. I admire your persistence and I can see that you are a trustworthy tenant. I will agree to your offer of 700 euros per month. I hope you will enjoy your stay in my apartment. Welcome to Duisburg!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 700 euros per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we could reach an agreement. You have chosen a great apartment in a fantastic location. I'm sure you'll be very happy here. Once the paperwork is complete, we can proceed with the lease signing. Thank you for choosing my apartment, and I look forward to a long and fruitful relationship. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
